alert.note: Alert for Ionia; Kent; Muskegon; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 10:52PM EDT until March 30 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...A mixture of sleet and freezing rain are expected tonight. Icing accumulation will be trace amounts to near a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Ionia, Muskegon, Kent and Ottawa counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation should begin around midnight and continue until sunrise. Several hours of freezing rain are expected during the early morning hours of Wednesday. Sleet is possible at the start of the precipitation. The freezing rain will end sooner over southern sections and later in northern parts of this area. The more significant icing is expected north of a line from Muskegon to Cannonsburg. South of that line this will mostly be a light rain event.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
